content:
Posted: May 1, 2014
												An ok game, I miss the good old days of hunting games like the Deer Hunter series. The grafics are nice but there is no real hunting aspect to it. No calls, no stands and the gun selection could have more. If you’re looking to just go kill then this is the game, they will point you to the trophy. With games like Skyrim and GTA out there I wish they could make us a well-rounded hunting sim.

content:
Posted: December 31, 2014
												Had to jump through WAAAY too many hoops just to get this thing to load. It's a terrible port, but once you get it loaded it is....mediocre at best. I don't know if the hit detection is too precise or too inaccurate, but either way you need to plan shots out. Also, don't just pick the gun you like the range of, you have to get a SPECIFIC gun in order to kill a SPECFIC creature set at a SPECIFIC distance so that you get a good trophy. WHAAAA???

Posted: December 24, 2016
												This game is awful, I really tried to like it but no. Cons: Can not go prone unless is a predesigated spot. The closer you get to your kill the more points you earn, so integrity has little to do with actual shot placement. Ride the rails Quadding on a map to collect trail cameras.You find game in 10 seconds because the game drops you in, you walk forward, and there are the deer, moose, elk ect. "Hunter vision" just incase you're extra awful.Sneak up on a deer by crab walking within 10 feet of it. Pros: Guns are well modelled, probably because Cabela's wants you to buy them.
